/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG -shared -Wl,-soname,libowl.so -o ../../../libowl.so CMakeFiles/owl.dir/APIContext.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/APIHandle.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/impl.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/Buffer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/Texture.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/CUDADriver.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/Object.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/Module.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/RegisteredObject.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/DeviceContext.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/ObjectRegistry.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/Context.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/SBTObject.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/RayGen.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/LaunchParams.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/MissProg.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/Variable.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/Geometry.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/Triangles.cu.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/UserGeom.cu.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/CurvesGeom.cu.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/SphereGeom.cu.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/Group.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/InstanceGroup.cu.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/TrianglesGeomGroup.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/CurvesGeomGroup.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/UserGeomGroup.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/SphereGeomGroup.cpp.o CMakeFiles/owl.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtbb.so.12.11 /usr/local/cuda-12.8/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/libcudart_static.a -ldl /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
